chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (A : Set) (P : A -> Prop) (p : {x : A | P x}), P (pi1 A P p)

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%
pi1 : forall (A : Set) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
proj2_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (e : {x : A | P x}), P (proj1_sig e)
projT2 : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : {x : A & P x}), P (projT1 x)
sig_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Type), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
sig_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
sig_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Set), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
sig_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> SProp), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
proj3_sig : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (e : {x : A | P x & Q x}), Q (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 e))
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
sigT_of_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> {x : A & P x}
sig_of_sigT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A & P x} -> {x : A | P x}
sig_of_sig2 : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x & Q x} -> {x : A | P x}
proj1_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
proj1_sig_eq = fun (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a}) (p : u = v) => f_equal (proj1_sig (P:=fun a : A => P a)) p : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a}), u = v -> proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v Arguments proj1_sig_eq {A}%type_scope {P}%function_scope {u v}
projT1 : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type), {x : A & P x} -> A
existT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x}
Inductive sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A | P x} Arguments sig [A]%type_scope _%type_scope Arguments exist [A]%type_scope _%function_scope
sig_of_sig2_eq = fun (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a & Q a}) (p : u = v) => f_equal (sig_of_sig2 (Q:=fun a : A => Q a)) p : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a & Q a}), u = v -> sig_of_sig2 u = sig_of_sig2 v Arguments sig_of_sig2_eq {A}%type_scope {P Q}%function_scope {u v}
Inductive sig2 (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) : Type := exist2 : forall x : A, P x -> Q x -> {x : A | P x & Q x} Arguments sig2 [A]%type_scope (_ _)%type_scope Arguments exist2 [A]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
Inductive sigT (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) : Type := existT : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A & P x} Arguments sigT [A]%type_scope _%type_scope Arguments existT [A]%type_scope _%function_scope
list_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Type), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)%list) -> forall l : list A, P l
EqdepFacts.eq_dep_eq_sig : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Prop) (p q : U) (x : P p) (y : P q), EqdepFacts.eq_dep U P p x q y -> exist P p x = exist P q y
EqdepFacts.eq_sig_eq_dep : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Prop) (p q : U) (x : P p) (y : P q), exist P p x = exist P q y -> EqdepFacts.eq_dep U P p x q y
EqdepFacts.eq_sig_iff_eq_dep : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Prop) (p q : U) (x : P p) (y : P q), exist P p x = exist P q y < -> EqdepFacts.eq_dep U P p x q y
eq_exist_uncurried = fun (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (u1 v1 : A) (u2 : P u1) (v2 : P v1) (pq : {p : u1 = v1 | eq_rect u1 P u2 v1 p = v2}) => let (p, q) := pq in match q in (_ = y) return (exist P u1 u2 = exist P v1 y) with | eq_refl => match p as e in (_ = y) return (exist P u1 u2 = exist P y (eq_rect u1 P u2 y e)) with | eq_refl => eq_refl end end : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (u1 v1 : A) (u2 : P u1) (v2 : P v1), {p : u1 = v1 | eq_rect u1 P u2 v1 p = v2} -> exist P u1 u2 = exist...
Relation_Operators.Pow : forall A : Set, (A -> A -> Prop) -> Set
Inductive Desc (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := d_nil : Relation_Operators.Desc A leA nil | d_one : forall x : A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (x :: nil) | d_conc : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil) Arguments Relation_Operators.Desc _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_one _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_conc _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _%list_scope
sumbool_rec : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Set), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
ssrfun.tag_of_sig : forall (I : Type) (P : I -> Prop), {x : I | P x} -> {x : I & P x}
Inductive eq_dep (U : Type) (P : U -> Type) (p : U) (x : P p) : forall q : U, P q -> Prop := eq_dep_intro : EqdepFacts.eq_dep U P p x p x Arguments EqdepFacts.eq_dep _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments EqdepFacts.eq_dep_intro _%type_scope _%function_scope
EqdepFacts.eq_sig_fst : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (x1 x2 : X) (H1 : P x1) (H2 : P x2), exist P x1 H1 = exist P x2 H2 -> x1 = x2
